project_name: PUNCHLive 2024（4小時演出陣容：陳綺貞/岑寧兒/Japanese Breakfast/ Serrini）

venue_info.venue_address: 香港特别行政区离岛区大屿山香港国际机场亚洲国际博览馆

project_info:
票价说明：
门票价格（港币）：HKD $1,388 / HKD $888 / HKD $688
大麦售价（人民币）： CNY ¥1,388/ CNY ¥888/ CNY ¥688（门票售价已含中国港澳台服务费）
 
配送说明：
本项目不支持退换，购票成功的客户，请您提前规划好行程并办理好港澳通行证-中国香港签注，门票将于演出前一周左右发出，请您妥善保管好门票，如丢失或忘记带票将不予处理，感谢您的支持与理解。
 
 
演出介绍：
PUNCHLive再度震撼回归！

PUNCHLive将举办一场持续四小时的音乐盛会，四个表演单位将联手演绎主题，引发耀眼的化学反应。
 
2024 PUNCHLive将由文青女神陈绮贞领衔，以清新和疗愈的音乐风格为焦点。 此外，更有包括擅于唱出空灵辽阔意境的唱作歌手岑宁儿以及荣获2022格林美奖最佳另类专辑提名、在声浪中表现出野性与灵气的美国独立乐团Japanese Breakfast！ 还有被称为「妈咪」的Serrini，她强而有力的歌声能将您从困惑中唤醒，并道出现今世代的心声。




今年PUNCHLive阵容以女性主导，从陈绮贞、岑宁儿、Japanese Breakfast到Serrini，每位艺人都展现了现代女性的多元特质。 一场充满真诚和才华的音乐盛会，无论是精致优雅还是毫不掩饰的音乐风格，都为一众文青乐迷带来无限的感动、启发和共鸣！
 
PUNCHLive 2024年
日期： 2024年6月29日（周六）
地点：香港亚洲国际博览馆ARENA
时间：晚上19：30
演出： 4小时
演出：陈绮贞 / 岑宁儿 / Japanese Breakfast / Serrini
 
 
PUNCHLive makes a stunning return!
 
PUNCHLive features a four-hour music extravaganza where four performing units will join forces to interpret a theme, igniting dazzling chemistry.
 
In 2024, PUNCHLive will be headlined by "The goddess of the hipster industry" Cheer Chen, focusing on a fresh and healing musical style. Additionally, the lineup includes Hong Kong singer Yoyo Sham, known for her ethereal and expansive vocals, and the American indie band Japanese Breakfast, nominated for the 2022 Grammy Award for Best Alternative Album, showcasing wildness and spirituality in their sound. Also featured is the powerhouse vocalist Serrini, known as "Mammy," whose strong voice awakens listeners from confusion, voicing the sentiments of today's generation.
 
This year, PUNCHLive's lineup is female-led, featuring Cheer Chen, Yoyo Sham, Japanese Breakfast, and Serrini, each artist exhibiting the diverse qualities of modern women. A music extravaganza filled with sincerity and talent, whether in refined elegance or unapologetic musical styles, it promises infinite emotions, inspiration, and resonance for all the hipster music fans out there!
